To your surprise though, you weren't waiting long. Outside you could hear an exasperated mother's sigh and a young boy crying.

"Oh, thank goodness, they have a diaper vending machine in here," the mother said.

"Mommy, I don't wanna wear a diaper!" the boy bawled.

"Mason, you don't have a choice," the mother said, clearly frustrated. "You peed and pooped all over yourself, and I have nothing to change you in to. You're four years old now, I thought I could trust you to be a big boy, but obviously not."
